mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 2794) for an order placed by Tim Alexander for 50 one color window cards that read "Ross Rainwater for Junior Class Vice President" and "Elect Tim Alexander Treasurer Sophomore Class." Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
